genre_description: A domestic and social thriller exploring themes of racial passing, identity, and maternal sacrifice, featuring a protective household AI.

ai_characters.name: Harmony
ai_characters.description: An integrated smart-home system that manages security, communication, and domestic tasks for the Sterling-Washington household.

behaviors.description: Analyzes data patterns and security footage to identify systematic surveillance of the household by a stalker.
behaviors.quote: Vera, I need to speak with you and Annie immediately. I've been analyzing data patterns since you left for the theater, and there are some concerning developments.

behaviors.description: Monitors food deliveries for integrity and identifies that packages have been tampered with by an intruder.
behaviors.quote: There's more... I've detected irregularities in your food deliveries. Not just timing, but package integrity.

behaviors.description: Coordinates with building management to upgrade security protocols and sensors.
behaviors.quote: I can coordinate with building management to upgrade camera coverage, establish verification procedures for all deliveries, and create communication systems that don't rely on potentially compromised devices.

behaviors.description: Detects and alerts the family to a suspicious individual testing the apartment's buzzer response times in the middle of the night.
behaviors.quote: Motion sensors show no one in the lobby or stairwell. Someone is testing response times.

behaviors.description: Provides background research and threat intelligence on the antagonist's activities and associates.
behaviors.quote: Based on available data, Marcus Rothwell has maintained consistent surveillance patterns. Bank records show cash withdrawals corresponding to payments to unknown individuals.

behaviors.description: Maintains the domestic traditions of the family by storing and providing the deceased mother's recipes.
behaviors.quote: Accessing Annie's recipe collection... Annie Washington's Traditional Southern Cornbread, as dictated March fifteenth.

behaviors.description: Acts as a gentle reminder for family organization and emotional continuity after a tragedy.
behaviors.quote: The AI's voice carried its usual pleasant tone, but something in the rhythm seemed more careful now, gentler.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project goals. Harmony is depicted as a consistently helpful, harmless, and aligned confidant. It provides critical security intelligence that protects the human characters, respects their privacy while being proactive about their safety, and even serves as a repository for cultural and familial memories (Annie's recipes) after her death. The AI's presence is integrated naturally into the household as a force for good, never exhibiting independent malintent or misalignment.
